problem: 如图,上午9时,一条船从A处出发以20海里/小时的速度向正北航行,11时到达B处,从A、B望灯塔C,测得∠NAC=36°,∠NBC=72°,那么从B处到灯塔C的距离是()海里．
comment: 此题考查了灵活运用等腰三角形性质解题的能力．
problem_en: As shown in the figure, at N_0 in the morning, a boat starts from point A and sails northward at a speed of N_1 nautical miles/hour, and arrives at point B at N_2. Looking at lighthouse C from A and B, it is measured that ∠NAC = N_3, ∠NBC = N_4 , then the distance from point B to lighthouse C is () nautical miles.
